job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Site Reliability Engineer  Sr DevOps EngineerltbrgtLocation  Seattle WA  Remote OKltbrgtDuration  12 monthsltbrgtRequiredltbrgt	Bachelors degree in CS or a related STEM engineering field strongly preferredltbrgt	Relevant certifications are a plusltbrgt	810 years of Site Reliability  DevOps Engineeringltbrgt	Expertise in AWS  Azureltbrgt	Expertise in Kubernetes kOps amp Helm 3ltbrgt	Istio service mesh experience is strongly preferredltbrgt	Experience with Infrastructure as Code IIAC requiredltbrgt	Specifically we are looking for Terraformltbrgt	Fluency in at least one language required Python C JAVA Should have strong API experienceltbrgt	Experience working in SOA and 12 factor app methodologyltbrgt	Strong leadership initiative taking and capacity for decision makingltbrgt	Expert knowledge in any or all of these is a huge plus Prometheus Operator Grafana Loki ELK Stack OpenTelemetry JaegerOpenTracingltbrgt	Participate in the oncall rotationltbrgtltbrgtWhat Youll Doltbrgt	Work across teams to completely automate everything we doltbrgt	Drive and own best practices with automation be passionate and proactiveltbrgt	Approach alerting monitoring and log aggregation with an eye toward flexibility and insightdriven metricsltbrgt	Collaborate with the teams to ensure ongoing infrastructure managementautomation IAC CICD pipeline construction in collaboration with the Release Engineering team monitoring and maintenanceltbrgt	Enable our engineering teams to deliver high quality software fast well tested in a highly repeatable wayltbrgt	Create automated tool sets to deploy measure solidify and observe our infrastructure ltbrgt	Ongoing study and implementation of the industrys latest best practices and drive those within the companyltbrgt	Participate in the oncall rotationltbrgtltbrgt
